name: Recovery
description: The Recovery metric describes the resilience of a system to recover services, in terms of performance and availability, after an attack has been performed.

values.name: Not Defined
values.description: This metric value is not defined. See CVSS documentation for details.

values.name: Automatic
values.description: The system recovers services automatically after an attack has been performed.

values.name: User
values.description: The system requires manual intervention by the user to recover services, after an attack has been performed.

values.name: Irrecoverable
values.description: The system services are irrecoverable by the user, after an attack has been performed.
